paper_abstract: Probabilistic submeasures generalizing the classical (numerical) submeasures are introduced and discussed in connection with some classes of aggregation functions. A special attention is paid to triangular norm-based probabilistic submeasures and more general semi-copula-based probabilistic submeasures. Some algebraic properties of classes of such submeasures are also studied. (C) 2012 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On distance distribution functions-valued submeasures related to aggregation functions
